name: Project Time Sheet Management Web
short_description:
Provides a web based system for users to enter Project time, Easy Web interface for PMs to add projects & Work Breakdown & Project estimates .
Provides Standard SQL reports for Project Financial Spend, WBS Spend & Time Sheet Defaulter List.
Can also be used to manage leaves along with Leave Reports. Must Read the Installation Guide (xls) document on zip folder

Solution uses : ASP .Net (c#) and SQL Database and SQL Reporting services for reports.
summary: Manage Project Time Sheet on Web based system
